overview: Matthias is spearheading Mopayâ€™s Business Development efforts in the United States. He is currently involved in realizing Mopay’s strategy for US based clients in the MMO, online gaming, content and social network space. Matthias has over 7 years of experience in the digital and media industry. Prior to Mopay, he worked for different companies in this industry, like 20th Century Fox, News-Com or Bertelsmann/RTL Group. Matthias holds a Diploma in Media Economics from the University of Applied Sciences RFH Cologne (Germany).

relationships.title: Head of Business Development, North America
